Creator: Aml Ahmed Elbana
Description:
Name fields accepts numbers and special characters.

*Expected Result:*

the system displays an error message “invalid name“.

*Actual Result:*

the names were accepted.
Custom field (StepsToReproduce):
1- Go to [https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login|https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login|smart-link]

2- Login with username “Admin“ and password “admin123“

3- Click on the Login button

4- Navigate to My Info

5- Go to Personal Details page

6- Fill First name with “123“

7- Fill the Middle name with “122#“

8- Fill the Last name with “122“

9- fill the rest of fields with valid data

10- Click on Save button.

Summary: Save button works with empty fields
Creator: Aml Ahmed Elbana
Description:
Save button works even when all fields are empty.

*Expected Result:*

The system shows an error message that the fields are empty.

*Actual Result:*

Save working successfully and the system displays a message “Updated successfully “.
Custom field (StepsToReproduce):
1- Go to [https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login|https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login|smart-link] 

2- Login with username “Admin“ and password “admin123“

3- Click on the Login button

4- Navigate to My Info

5- Go to Personal Details page

6- Keep all fields empty

7- Click on save button
